BG3 Cleric Class Progression

Level 1 - Choose a Cleric Domain (Life, Light, Knowledge, Trickery, Nature, Tempest, War) Level 1 - Choose a Deity (Class Feature) Level 2 - Channel Divinity Charges (Feature) Level 2 - Turn Undead (Action) Level 4 - Feat - Choose one from the Feats list Level 5 - Destroy Undead (Class Feature) Level 6 - Channel Divinity Charges (Class Feature) Level 8 - Feat - Choose one from the Feats list Level 10 - Divine I
